1.0.name: wordpress/tagnpin-social-loyalty-rewards-incentives
1.0.description:
tagNpin is a referral program that's simple to install on your WordPress blog. As soon as it's installed, a referral floating button will show up on your site. Your readers will be able to connect with Facebook and earn points for their actions on your blog and referring friends.

tagNpin incentivizes your readers to invite their friends to check out your blog and will help you engage your current users with more repeat visits, Facebook likes and comments.

Key features for your readers:

  • Readers connect to your Referral program with Facebook.
  • Readers earn points or coupons for referring friends.
  • Readers earn points or badges for Facebook likes.
  • Readers earn points or badges for PlusOnes.
  • Readers earn points or badges for Tweets.
  • Readers compete to be at the top of your leaderboard.
  • Readers redeem their points for quality gift cards and offers.
  • Facebook Referral app gets generated au
